dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, diving into some pretty serious news today, we're looking at the aftermath of that hurricane in the Pavlodar region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, diving into some pretty serious news today, we're looking at the aftermath of that hurricane in the Pavlodar region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, the hurricane struck Pavlodar region in the late afternoon of June 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's really, um, quite devastating from what we're hearing. The winds were just insane, up to 43 meters per second, if you can believe that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's really, um, quite devastating from what we're hearing. The winds were just insane, up to forty three meters per second, if you can believe that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the akimat, on June 19, storm winds of up to 43 meters per second were recorded in the Pavlodar region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Forty-three meters per second? Wow. And, you know, the human cost is really hitting hard. We've got 16 people injured, Host_B, including some children.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forty-three meters per second? Wow. And, you know, the human cost is really hitting hard. We've got sixteen people injured, Host_B, including some children.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to emergency services, 16 people were injured, including three children.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's just awful. Children too? [overlaps] And a fatality, I heard?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's just awful. Children too? And a fatality, I heard?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Yeah, unfortunately, one fatality confirmed – a woman, uh, born in '68, in Aksu. Just heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, unfortunately, one fatality confirmed - a woman, uh, born in sixty eight, in Aksu. Just heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One fatality was recorded " a 1968-born woman died in Aksu, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the damage, I mean, it's not just people, right? Like, infrastructure has taken a massive hit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the damage, I mean, it's not just people, right? Like, infrastructure has taken a massive hit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The storm caused significant damage to infrastructure, power outages, and injuries among the population.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, completely. We're talking roofs damaged on, uh, 47 buildings in Pavlodar alone, and six of those were social institutions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, completely. We're talking roofs damaged on, uh, forty seven buildings in Pavlodar alone, and six of those were social institutions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Pavlodar, roofs of 47 buildings were damaged, including 6 social institutions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it wasn't just Pavlodar, either. Aksu, Ekibastuz, Bayanaul district… [interrupts] like, bus stops gone, playgrounds, dozens of trees uprooted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it wasn't just Pavlodar, either. Aksu, Ekibastuz, Bayanaul district... like, bus stops gone, playgrounds, dozens of trees uprooted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Aksu and Ekibastuz, 23 facilities were affected; in Bayanaul district " 7 facilities... Storm winds damaged bus stops, children™s playgrounds, and uprooted dozens of trees

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, those trees apparently fell on parked vehicles too, just adding to the destruction. And power outages, obviously, a big issue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, those trees apparently fell on parked vehicles too, just adding to the destruction. And power outages, obviously, a big issue.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: uprooted dozens of trees, many of which fell on parked vehicles, causing further destruction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Aksu and Bayanaul district are, um, confirmed to be without power right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Aksu and Bayanaul district are, um, confirmed to be without power right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As of now, outages have been confirmed in Aksu and Bayanaul district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But, you know, the good news is, restoration efforts are really underway. Crews are out there, fixing those communication and power lines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, you know, the good news is, restoration efforts are really underway. Crews are out there, fixing those communication and power lines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Restoration efforts are underway. Crews are working to repair 16 damaged communication and power line poles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, over 300 workers and, like, 103 units of special equipment have been deployed. [overlaps] They're really getting after it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, over three hundred workers and, like, one hundred three units of special equipment have been deployed. They're really getting after it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 300 workers and 103 units of special equipment have been deployed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] That's great to hear. So, hopefully, things will be back to normal for those communities, you know, as quickly as possible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's great to hear. So, hopefully, things will be back to normal for those communities, you know, as quickly as possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, fingers crossed for everyone affected in Pavlodar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, fingers crossed for everyone affected in Pavlodar.
